title: 30 Delightful Graphic Design Books, Written by Gino
content:
Hi everyone!

I found [this article](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022113006/http:/www.youthedesigner.com/2007/12/10/30-delightful-graphic-design-books/) and wanted to share to anyone who dont know it.  
The list seems very good. Anyone wants to add/remove/replace any book?

António
author: afonseca1974

comments.content: _Graphic Design: A New History_ Hasn’t that book been torn apart by historians for being woefully inaccurate?
